head.citation-title: 2010 IEEE International Conference on Image Processing, ICIP 2010 - Proceedings
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 1151 papers. The topics discussed include: two-level optimized tone mapping for high dynamic range images; a practical algorithm for tanner graph based image interpolation; fast geometric re-ranking for image-based retrieval; efficient feature selection for polyp detection; image retrieval on the honeycomb image browser; video object inpainting using manifold-based action prediction; hue-based quaternionic criterion for focused-color extraction; on geometric and soft shape content-based search; a novel method of fingerprint minutiae extraction based on Gabor phase; a comparative study on quality assessment of high resolution fingerprint images; PCTV: a biologically- and psychologically-inspired edge and line detection; 3D face recovery from intensities of general and unknown lighting using partial least squares; photo-consistent surfaces from a sparse set of viewpoints; view synthesis based on conditional random fields and graph cuts; and super resolution image reconstruction using total variation regularization and learning-based method.
